## ISentJoinRequestStore interface

This is a store that contains all pending join requests where the current user has requested to join various conversations.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ISentJoinRequestStore extends IStore<ISentJoinRequest> 
```
```typescript
export declare namespace ISentJoinRequestStore 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getJoinRequests()](./core-conversations.isentjoinrequeststore.getjoinrequests.md) | Get all pending join requests for the current user |
|  [sendRequestToJoinConversation(conversationId)](./core-conversations.isentjoinrequeststore.sendrequesttojoinconversation.md) | Send a request to join a conversation. |
